CN.content:

Paragraph: 11 The simplest aromatic imide system is phthalimide ( 3 ) and thiophene imide ( 4 ) ( Figure 1 ).

1. Phthalimide (3)
2. Thiophene imide (4)

These are the Material Name entities in the paragraph. Phthalimide and Thiophene imide are the specific names of the aromatic imide systems mentioned in the text.

1. Phthalimide
2. Thiophene imide

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

2. Thiophene imide (4)
